author: allisonfromm
title: Catalyst Circle Mentorship
description: Catalyst Circle (CC) members serve for short periods of time. Mentorship from the previous circle is needed to ensure smooth transitions.
solution: Funding via Catalyst to ensure adequate time for members of the previous Circle to provide mentorship and assistance to the new Circle.
experience: CC alumni are elected members of the Catalyst community from key sectors of the ecosystem to identify and solve mutual interests.
